content.rendered:
Retail and Wholesale

Makanaka Investments owns four big supermarkets, three in Zvishavane town trading as Pote Central, Pote Lucky 7, Pote Machipisa and one in Shurugwi town. We also spread into two wholesale branches that supplies goods to retailers all over the Midlands and Masvingo provinces. The groceries department also has three counter shops scattered across various residential areas of Zvishavane. We also have other shops in Mberengwa at Mataga growth point and Chivi at Takavarasha Township.

The company has grown to be the leading supplier of all grocery products within the southern regions of the country. Our competitive prices have also won us a good reputation all over the Midlands and Masvingo provinces and the areas surrounding them. We have a commanding customer base having garnered most of the organisations within our sphere of influence including private companies, government departments, NGOs, mines, schools, hospitals, religious organisations, home projects and the public in general. We also prepare and supply grocery hampers to all employees at Mimosa Mining Company and Sabi Gold Mine and has been doing so effectively for a considerable period.

Our groceries department have the capacity to supply products in any volume to meet any demand to any location within our national boundaries.

We stock a wide variety of products acquired from both local and foreign suppliers and always make sure that every product needed by our customers is readily available.

Our range of products includes the following:

  • All basic commodities
  • Dried Foods
  • Co cordials
  • Juices and Soft Drinks
  • Laundry and sanitary products
  • Toiletries
  • Linen
  • Butchery, deli and bakery products
  • Fruit & Veg
  • Kitchenware
  • Hardware and Electrical equipments
  • Stationary
  • Liquor
  • Medicine and healthcare products
  • Cosmetics
  • Farm implements
  • Pesticides

The company is built upon a heritage of providing customers with healthy, fresh and tasty products, as well as friendly, accountable service.

We stock products directly from manufacturers with whom we collaborate in creative promotions and innovative packaging

We have seized the opportunity to heavily invest in successful development and repositioned our dedicated staff who injected their trademark vigour, years of experience and long-time loyalty into the development and maintenance of our service delivery.

Today the company is a strong competitor on the local market and continues to grow, building on its ethos that always puts the customer first.

We have also understand the need to secure and retain qualified employees and have been upgrading our systems to meet the technological advances and improvements in workplace productivity

The company’s transport division always make sure that all our stocking needs are   met by providing all the required support as far as transportation and delivery services are concerned. We always get all products in time from our suppliers and in turn make sure that no customer will be turned away by the unavailability of any product they need.

The company has grown to be the leading supplier of all grocery products within the southern region of the country.
